raw_body:
VERNON C. UDUGAMPOLA MBE – We are saddened to announce the peaceful passing of Vernon C. Udugampola MBE on the 26th February at his home in the UK. Vernon was the dearly beloved husband of the late Kamanie Udugampola and brother of Donald,​ Malcolm,​ Roland,​ Asoka,​ Indrani Nagodavithana,​ Chandrani Suraweera and the late Quintus. He was an active Social Worker,​ founder of the Sylvia Lanka Foundation and proud member of the Old Boys’ Association of Richmond College,​ Galle. The funeral is to be held at 2 p.m. on Saturday,​ the 2nd March at Hendon Cemetery & Crematorium (UK). 79,​ Pinner Road,​ Northwood Hills,​ Middx,​ HA6 1QN,​ United Kingdom.
014630
